item.title: Song Young-kyu, Korean Star of ‘Extreme Job,’ Dies at 55
item.description: South Korean actor Song Young-kyu, known internationally for his memorable turn as Chief Choi in the 2019 box office hit “Extreme Job,” died on Monday. He was 55. Song was found unresponsive inside a
